name: Kill The Prince
description:
A Game Created On 2021.10, Aiming At Getting the Certification To Join The Game Develop Club.

Its combat mode is pretty much similar to 《Undertale》, and I confess that I and my parterner really love the game. He recommand the game to me, and I was surprised when I know it's made by only one person (might be 2, I heard, but that's not important).

I made most of the assets in the game. My dream start from here actually, in some way.

See something about it:

https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1tb4y1Y7HR
